name: Unreal Tournament (1999)
description: Installation from CD-ROM or ISO provided by you.

files.file1: N/A:Select the game's Setup.exe file (in the System folder). Do NOT change the installation path !

content:
custom-name: Unreal Tournament
env:
  WINEDLLOVERRIDES: mscoree=d;mshtml=d
files:
- file1: N/A:Select the game's Setup.exe file (in the System folder). Do NOT change
    the installation path !
game:
  exe: drive_c/UnrealTournament/System/UnrealTournament.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- execute:
    command: $file1
- task:
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
